        public static MamaMsg newMamaMsg(char payload)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Get a MamaMsg to publish. This method handles setting the correct payload id for this publisher. The msg is owned by the caller, but can be reused for the life of the application.
        Returns:
        MamaMsg*.
        Throws:
        MamaStatus, - MdsOmStatus
        java.lang.Exception

      • convertMsgStatusToMamaStatus

        public static short convertMsgStatusToMamaStatus(short msgStatus)
        Convert a Mama msg status to a Mama status. This is only for the Tick42 way of returning info about publish event. This will be removed when OM implements a standard way to do this.

        Returns:
